title: Disney Universe
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Disney Universe is an off-the-wall non-stop action adventure where Disney worlds and characters mix up for the first time.  Suit up in iconic costumes and face challenges in legendary Disney worlds.  Defeat enemies, collect coins and powerups, unlock new costumes and explore with friends as you battle in a mix-up of worlds inspired by numerous Disney and Disney•Pixar films

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Baby Elephant Costume
childDownloads.description: Explore Disney Universe and suit up as the kind and caring Baby Elephant, from Disney’s The Jungle Book.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Bagheera Costume
childDownloads.description: Play a part in the battle to save Disney Universe and suit up as caring and responsible Bagheera, from Disney’s The Jungle Book.

childDownloads.title: Bee Hive
childDownloads.description: For your Xbox LIVE ® Avatar:  use this Bee Hive prop to extend the fun outside the game.

childDownloads.title: Burger Bite
childDownloads.description: For your Xbox LIVE ® Avatar:  enjoy this burger, as long as the teeth don't take a bite first.

childDownloads.title: Cane Tool
childDownloads.description: For your Xbox LIVE ® Avatar:  this cane will surprise your avatar when it transforms into Jafar's staff.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe

Suit up in iconic costumes and face challenges in legendary Disney worlds.  Defeat enemies, collect coins and powerups, unlock new costumes and explore with friends as you battle in a mix-up of worlds inspired by numerous Disney and Disney•Pixar films

Suit up in iconic costumes and face challenges in legendary Disney worlds.  Defeat enemies, collect coins and powerups, unlock new costumes and explore with friends as you battle in a mix-up of worlds inspired by numerous Disney and Disney•Pixar films

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Animal Costume
childDownloads.description: Have a wild time when you suit up as Animal, from Disney’s The Muppets. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Cruella de Vil Costume
childDownloads.description: Suit up as fashionably evil Cruella de Vil, from Disney's classic 101 Dalmations. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Daisy Duck & Absolem Costumes
childDownloads.description: Suit up as classic and delightful Daisy Duck costume. Includes costume specific upgradable tool. Suit up as wise caterpillar Absolem, from Tim Burton's Alice in Wonderland. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Evil Queen Costume
childDownloads.description: Who's the fairest of them all? Why the Evil Queen costume from Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarves, of course! Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Fozzie Costume
childDownloads.description: Make people laugh when you suit up as comedian Fozzie, from Disney’s The Muppets. Waka Waka! Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Gonzo Costume
childDownloads.description: Have no fear when you suit up as daredevil Gonzo, from Disney’s The Muppets. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Hades Costume
childDownloads.description: Suit up for tricks as Hades, from Disney's animated film Hercules. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Kermit Costume
childDownloads.description: Lead the way when you suit up as cheerful Kermit, from Disney’s The Muppets. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Maleficent Costume
childDownloads.description: Suit up as the classic and villainous Maleficent, from Disney's Sleeping Beauty. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Miss Piggy Costume
childDownloads.description: Drama is abundant when you suit up as headstrong Miss Piggy, from Disney’s The Muppets. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Mowgli Costume
childDownloads.description: Get into the action of Disney Universe when you suit up as independent man-cub Mowgli, from Disney’s The Jungle Book.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Muppets Costume Pack
childDownloads.description: Suit up to save the universe as the humorous Muppets characters!  Costumes include Kermit, Miss Piggy, Animal, Gonzo and Fozzie.  Each costume comes with its own upgradeable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Neverland Level Pack
childDownloads.description: The Disney Universe adventure continues with a new downloadable level pack featuring Disney’s Peter Pan.  Suit up and battle through magical Neverland in some of your favorite costumes, including Mr. Smee, Wendy, Michael, John and the mischievous lostboy, Slightly.  Each costume comes with its own upgradeable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Nightmare Before Christmas Level Pack
childDownloads.description: The Disney Universe is expanding with new downloadable content from Tim Burton's Nightmare Before Christmas. Suit up and battle through Halloween Town in some of your favorite Nightmare Before Christmas costumes, including Jack Skellington, Sally, the Mayor of Halloween Town, Oogie Boogie and Dr. Finkelstein. Each costume includes its own upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Phineas and Ferb Level Pack
childDownloads.description: Disney Universe continues to grow with a new downloadable level pack featuring Disney Phineas and Ferb.  Suit up, power up and battle through the suburbs of Danville in some of your favorite Phineas and Ferb costumes, including Phineas, Ferb, Dr. Doofenshmirtz, Agent P, and Candace.  Each costume includes its own upgradeable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Ursula Costume
childDownloads.description: Suit up as deep sea diva Ursula, from Disney's Little Mermaid. Includes costume specific upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Villains Costume Pack
childDownloads.description: Suit up as some of Disney's greatest villains with the Disney Universe Villains Costume Pack.  Costumes include the delightfully wicked Cruella de Vil, Ursula, Hades, Maleficent and Snow White's Evil Queen – each with it's own upgradable tool.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Wall.E Trailer
childDownloads.description: Disney Universe: Team Up and Compete in the Wall.E World. Defeat enemies, collect coins and powerups, unlock new costumes and explore with friends as you battle in a mix-up of worlds inspired by numerous Disney and Pixar films.  Suit-up for action as more than 40 classic and contemporary Disney characters including Wall-E, Alice, Mike, TRON and Stitch. Mischief, magic and mayhem reign as players explore 6 different worlds inspired by Disney and Pixar films.

childDownloads.title: Electric Storm
childDownloads.description: For your Xbox LIVE ® Avatar:  don't let this storm prop strike.  Run fast!

childDownloads.title: Flamingo Tool
childDownloads.description: For your Xbox LIVE ® Avatar:  this flamingo will surprise your avatar when it transforms into the Red Queen's axe.

childDownloads.title: Disney Universe Jungle Book Costume Pack
childDownloads.description: Suit up as some of your favorite characters from Disney’s The Jungle Book.  Costumes include the adventurous Mowgli, Shere Khan, King Louie, Bagheera and Baby Elephant—each with its own upgradeable tool.  Available for purchase on the Xbox Live® online entertainment network and the PlayStation® Network.
